Article Title: Who is Gyanesh Kumar? India's 26th Chief Election Commissioner
Article Text:
Who is Gyanesh Kumar?

Gyanesh Kumar is a retired IAS officer from the 1988 Kerala cadre.

He has previously served as Secretary in the ministry of parliamentary affairs and the Ministry of Cooperation.

He was instrumental in setting up the Shri Ram Janmabhoomi Teertha Kshetra Trust during his tenure at the ministry of home affairs.

Kumar played a key role in handling Jammu and Kashmir affairs when Article 370 was revoked in 2019.

was revoked in 2019. He has also worked in various capacities in Kerala, including as District Collector of Ernakulam and MD of Kerala State Cooperative Bank.

He holds a BTech in Civil Engineering from IIT Kanpur and has studied Business Finance at ICFAI and Environmental Economics at Harvard University.

NEW DELHI: Prime Minister Narendra Modi-led selection committee has appointed Gyanesh Kumar as India's next Chief Election Commissioner (CEC), replacing Rajiv Kumar, who retires on Tuesday upon reaching the age of 65.Rajiv Kumar, who took charge as CEC in May 2022, oversaw several key elections, including the Lok Sabha elections in 2024 and various state assembly polls. His tenure was marked by efforts to enhance electoral transparency and voter participation. His retirement paves the way for a new leadership at the Election Commission of India (ECI), with Gyanesh Kumar taking the helm.However, the appointment process has sparked controversy. The Congress party urged the government to defer the selection until the Supreme Court hears a petition challenging the revised appointment process for the CEC and election commissioners. Congress leader Abhishek Manu Singhvi criticised the exclusion of the Chief Justice of India from the selection panel, alleging that the government seeks to control the Election Commission rather than maintain its credibility.He took charge as an election commissioner on March 15, 2024, and was one of the two commissioners appointed by the selection panel, alongside Sukhbir Sandhu from the Uttarakhand cadre.
Article Summary: Gyanesh kumar is a retired ias officer from the state of kerala. He was one of the two commissioners on the selection panel. The selection process has been delayed until the supreme court hears a petition challenging the selection process for the cec and election commissioners. The petition was filed by former cec of india ravi agrawal.

Article Title: Taylor Swift avoids "publicly supporting" Blake Lively and fans have figured out the reason behind it
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Taylor Swift Has ‚ÄúDistanced‚Äù Herself From Blake Lively Because Of This Reason, Fans Say



Blake Lively Was Not Spotted With Taylor Swift At Super Bowl 2025



Taylor Swift, the billionaire pop star, has been in the news since she got booed at the Super Bowl last weekend when Travis Kelce‚Äôs team, the Kansas City Chiefs lost the trophy to the Philadelphia Eagles. Away from the Super Bowl drama, the pop star has also found herself involved in the legal drama between Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni. But now, the reason why Taylor Swift has ‚Äúdistanced‚Äù herself from Blake Lively is pretty clear, according to fans.Taylor Swift has remained pretty silent about the whole controversial situation and is yet to make an official announcement about it. It seems like fans have found the reason behind it.A fan took to X and wrote, ‚ÄúThe fact that Taylor Swift, huge advocate of the womens movement, didnt support bestie Blake Lively speaks volumes. If anyone would support, know and have proof that Blake was harrassed it would be Taylor Swift. Talks, calls, texts...Yet Taylor didn't support it. Hmmm‚ÄùAnother fan wrote, ‚ÄúIf my bestfriend who made me godmother to her children was in a legal battle over sexual harassment & retaliation, I would be standing ten toes down with her. I would not abandon her. The fact that Taylor Swift distanced herself from Blake Lively is damning enough.‚ÄùWhile it is not confirmed why Taylor Swift has not been spotted recently with her best friend, Blake Lively, fans are pretty convinced that this is the reason behind it.For the unversed, Blake Lively had accused Justin Baldoni of harassment and Justin filed a counter lawsuit against Blake Lively and her husband Ryan Reynolds accusing them of defamation and trying to take over control of their blockbuster movie, It Ends With Us. Taylor Swift was named by Justin Baldoni in the lawsuit as he felt Blake Lively tried to ‚Äúuse‚Äù Taylor Swift‚Äôs power and influence to gain control of the movie.Many fans also expected to see Taylor Swift and Blake Lively at the Super Bowl held last weekend but Blake was nowhere to be found at the stadium. This was in complete contrast to the 2024 Super Bowl when Blake Lively was spotted cheering on Travis Kelce as she stood next to Taylor Swift. The two were also spotted hugging each other when the Kansas City Chiefs won the trophy last year.A few days ago, a source revealed to Page Six that ‚ÄúTaylor really wishes Blake hadn‚Äôt dragged her into this whole situation.‚Äù This might be true considering how Taylor Swift has avoided being spotted with Blake Lively.With the Chiefs losing the Super Bowl, both Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift have been trolled but have remained silent.Also Read: Hailee Steinfeld reacts as Josh Allen gets asked out on a date during their appearance at NFL Honors
Article Summary: Taylor swift has been in the news since she got booed at the super bowl last weekend when travis kelce‚Äôs team, the kansas city chiefs lost the trophy to the philadelphia eagles. The pop star has also found herself involved in the legal drama between blake lively and justin baldoni.

Article Text:

NEW DELHI: The ICC Champions Trophy is set to begin in Pakistan on February 19, marking its return after an eight-year gap. The marquee tournament will feature the top eight men‚Äôs ODI teams competing for the prestigious title. The teams are divided into two groups, with the top two from each group advancing to the semifinals.Group A includes hosts Pakistan, India, New Zealand, and Bangladesh, setting the stage for intense subcontinental clashes. Meanwhile, Group B features Australia, England, South Africa, and Afghanistan.India will kick off their ICC Men's Champions Trophy 2025 campaign against Bangladesh on February 20, followed by a high-stakes encounter against Pakistan on February 23. Their final Group A match will be against New Zealand on March 2.The 15-match tournament will be played over 19 days across Pakistan and the UAE. Under the hybrid model, India will play all their matches in Dubai, including the semifinal and final, should they qualify.Led by Rohit Sharma, India enter the competition with a strong squad, featuring eight players from their victorious T20 World Cup 2024 campaign.However, the team has suffered a setback with pace spearhead Jasprit Bumrah ruled out due to injury. Young pacer Harshit Rana has been named as his replacement, while Varun Chakaravarthy comes in for Yashasvi Jaiswal.Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul, Rishabh Pant, Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Washington Sundar, Kuldeep Yadav, Harshit Rana, Mohd. Shami, Arshdeep Singh, Ravindra Jadeja, Varun Chakaravarthy.Defending champions Pakistan, led by wicketkeeper-batter Mohammad Rizwan, will look to defend their 2017 title. The squad includes key players from their previous Champions Trophy-winning campaign, such as Fakhar Zaman, Babar Azam, and Faheem Ashraf. However, they will be without opener Saim Ayub, who has been ruled out due to injury.Mohammad Rizwan (c), Babar Azam, Fakhar Zaman, Kamran Ghulam, Saud Shakeel, Tayyab Tahir, Faheem Ashraf, Khushdil Shah, Salman Ali Agha, Usman Khan, Abrar Ahmed, Haris Rauf, Mohammad Hasnain, Naseem Shah, Shaheen Shah Afridi.ODI world champions Australia will enter the tournament with a depleted squad, as several senior players have withdrawn. Captain Pat Cummins, along with key pacers Josh Hazlewood and Mitchell Starc, have pulled out, leading to Steve Smith taking over the captaincy.Additionally, the Aussies will be without all-rounder Mitchell Marsh. In their absence, newcomers Ben Dwarshuis, Spencer Johnson, and Tanveer Sangha have been called up to bolster the squad.Steve Smith (c), Sean Abbott, Alex Carey, Ben Dwarshuis, Nathan Ellis, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Aaron Hardie, Travis Head, Josh Inglis, Spencer Johnson, Marnus Labuschagne, Glenn Maxwell, Tanveer Sangha, Matthew Short, Adam Zampa.Cooper Connolly.New Zealand‚Äôs squad saw a late change after pacer Ben Sears was ruled out due to a hamstring injury, with Jacob Duffy named as his replacement. Mitchell Santner, captaining the Kiwis in his first ICC tournament, will lead a squad that blends youth and experience.With veteran pacers Trent Boult and Tim Southee unavailable, the onus will be on Matt Henry, Lockie Ferguson, and young quick Nathan Smith to step up.Mitchell Santner (c), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Lockie Ferguson, Matt Henry, Tom Latham, Daryl Mitchell, Will O‚ÄôRourke, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Jacob Duffy, Nathan Smith, Kane Williamson, Will Young.Meanwhile, Bangladesh, under the leadership of Najmul Hossain Shanto, will look to improve on their semi-final finish from 2017.Veteran campaigners Mahmudullah and Mushfiqur Rahim bring experience and stability, while promising youngsters Nahid Rana and Rishad Hossain add dynamism to the squad.Nazmul Hossain Shanto (c), Soumya Sarkar, Tanzid Hasan, Tawhid Hridoy, Mushfiqur Rahim, MD Mahmud Ullah, Jaker Ali Anik, Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Rishad Hossain, Taskin Ahmed, Mustafizur Rahman, Parvez Hossai Emon, Nasum Ahmed, Tanzim Hasan Sakib, Nahid Rana.Afghanistan made a late change to their squad, with young spinner Nangyal Kharoti replacing the injured Allah Ghazanfar.The team retains experienced stars Rashid Khan and Mohammad Nabi, while Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran bolster the top order.Hashmatullah Shahidi (c), Ibrahim Zadran, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Sediqullah Atal, Rahmat Shah, Ikram Alikhil, Gulbadin Naib, Azmatullah Omarzai, Mohammad Nabi, Rashid Khan, Nangyal Kharoti, Noor Ahmad, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Farid Malik, Naveed Zadran. Reserves: Darwish Rasooli, Bilal SamiEngland‚Äôs squad features the return of Joe Root, while Tom Banton comes in as a replacement for the injured Jacob Bethell.Led by Jos Buttler, their pace attack will be spearheaded by Jofra Archer and Mark Wood, with Gus Atkinson and Jamie Overton providing support.The ECB statement read, "Scans on a left groin injury have confirmed that England Men's batter Ben Duckett is fit and available for the ICC Champions Trophy. Duckett sustained the injury while fielding during the first innings of England's third ODI defeat to India in Ahmedabad last Wednesday."Jos Buttler (c), Jofra Archer, Gus Atkinson, Jacob Bethell, Harry Brook, Brydon Carse, Ben Duckett, Jamie Overton, Jamie Smith, Liam Livingstone, Adil Rashid, Joe Root, Saqib Mahmood, Phil Salt, Mark WoodSouth Africa suffered a setback with Anrich Nortje ruled out due to injury, prompting the inclusion of Corbin Bosch.Kagiso Rabada spearheads the Proteas' pace attack, while Temba Bavuma, Aiden Markram, Rassie van der Dussen, and Heinrich Klaasen form the backbone of their batting lineup.Temba Bavuma (c), Tony de Zorzi, Marco Jansen, Heinrich Klaasen, Keshav Maharaj, Aiden Markram, David Miller, Wiaan Mulder, Lungi Ngidi, Kagiso Rabada, Ryan Rickelton, Tabraiz Shamsi, Tristan Stubbs, Rassie van der Dussen, Corbin Bosch.Kwena Maphaka
Article Summary: Icc champions trophy begins in pakistan on february 19. Top eight men's odi teams will compete for the prestigious title. Group a includes hosts pakistan, india, new zealand, and bangladesh. Group b features australia, england, south africa, and afghanistan. Mitchell santner captaining the kiwis in his first icc tournament.

Article Title: NFL Hall of Famer Shannon Sharpe advised Travis Kelce to take control of his future and not let the organization dictate his next move
Article Text:
Image via Imag Images

Shannon Sharpe advises Travis Kelce about his future

Chiefs give Travis Kelce DEADLINE to decide NFL future | Nightcap

After the Eagles' 40-22 victory against the Chiefs, Philadelphia experienced a tragic event where a man shot two women. Fortunately, both were stable and the suspect was arrested. Meanwhile, the Chiefs faced doubts for the next season due to their poor performance in the Super Bowl, particularly for their future quarterback, Travis Kelce. Kelce, at 35, has had his worst season in yards and touchdowns since his rookie year.Travis Kelce, the longest-tenured player on the Chiefs roster, has been a cornerstone since being drafted 63rd overall in 2013. He has appeared in 175 games and is considered one of the greatest tight ends in NFL history. However, his age is starting to catch up, and this season he appeared slower and lacked his usual explosiveness. With one year left on his contract, the Chiefs must decide if keeping him is worth the financial investment.NFL Hall of Famer Shannon Sharpe advises Kelce to take control of his future and not let the organization dictate his next move, referencing legendary players like Tom Brady, Peyton Manning, and Jerry Rice who changed teams late in their careers."Tom Brady won six Super Bowls and ended up in Tampa. Peyton Manning had four MVPs, two Super Bowl appearances, one Super Bowl MVP and finished in Denver. Jerry Rice...I don't have to go anymore," Sharpe said on his podcast with Ochocinco. "Understand the business and how it works. Do what is in your best interest.‚ÄùShannon Sharpe's comparisons are valid, but Kelce's situation is unique. Unlike Brady and Manning, Kelce's last game was a Super Bowl loss, making it difficult for him to process his last game in a successful career. He wants to return to the most important game, making it difficult for him to process.Kelce, despite declining production, holds the NFL record for most receptions and playoff receiving touchdowns by a receiver. He currently ranks 14th on the all-time receptions list with 1,004 career catches. If he returns for one more season, he has a good chance of joining Marvin Harrison and Larry Fitzgerald as the only players in this elite group to spend their entire careers with one team.Also Read: ‚ÄúAn upward trajectory‚Äù: Birmingham fans express their opinions on minority owner of Birmingham City club Tom Brady With free agency approaching on March 12, Kelce must now evaluate his options and seek advice from his closest friends, including Taylor Swift. Chiefs head coach Andy Reid believes Kelce has the potential to be a great coach, but it seems more likely that he will pursue entertainment opportunities. With past hosting gigs and an upcoming role in Happy Gilmore 2, Kelce's post-NFL future could be as high-profile as his playing career.
Article Summary: Travis kelce, 35, has had his worst season in yards and touchdowns since his rookie year. Nfl hall of famer shannon sharpe advises kelce to take control of his future and not let the organization dictate his next move. Kelce's last game was a super bowl loss, making it difficult for him to process.

Article Title: NBA Buyout Rumors: Dallas Mavericks reportedly attempted pursuit of $177 million All-Star to form Big 3 with Anthony Davis and Kyrie Irving
Article Text:
Anthony Davis (Image via Getty)

Dallas Mavericks

All-Star

Ben Simmons

‚ÄúLeague sources say that Dallas had interest in joining the buyout market bidding for Ben Simmons, who swiftly joined the LA Clippers after negotiating his release from the Brooklyn Nets and held appeal to the Dallas Mavericks as a small ball center,‚Äù

Anthony Davis at the Mavericks Press Conference (Image via Getty)

‚ÄúThe Mavericks, though, sit less than $200,000 away from the NBA's first luxury-tax apron ‚Ä¶ even after Davis waived his trade kicker upon learning that the Lakers were dealing him to Dallas for Doncic.‚Äù

Thehave been making bold moves to reshape their roster after trading Luka Doncic for Anthony Davis . Adding Caleb Martin from the Philadelphia 76ers was another step, but the team isn‚Äôt done yet. According to NBA insider Marc Stein, the Mavericks recently tried to sign formerbefore he joined the Los Angeles Clippers.Stein reported on The Stein Line that Dallas showed interest in Simmons during the buyout market.Stein wrote.Ben Simmons, a three-time All-Star, could have provided the Mavericks with much-needed playmaking and defensive versatility. While he hasn‚Äôt been the same dominant force since his Philadelphia 76ers days, his ability to facilitate and guard multiple positions would have been valuable for Dallas.However, financial constraints played a role in the Dallas Mavericks ‚Äô inability to secure Simmons. Stein noted,Despite missing out on Ben Simmons, the Mavericks‚Äô interest signals their intent to remain active in the buyout market. With the trade deadline behind them, Dallas is likely to explore additional options to bolster their roster for a playoff push. The team‚Äôs success will depend on who becomes available and how quickly they can integrate new pieces.Simmons‚Äô move to the Clippers also sets up a potential postseason showdown between the two teams. If Dallas can stay healthy and add the right pieces, they could make a deep playoff run and possibly return to the NBA Finals.For now, the Dallas Mavericks‚Äô pursuit of Ben Simmons highlights their determination to build a contender around Anthony Davis and Kyrie Irving . Fans will be watching closely to see what moves come next.Also read: NBA Buyout Rumors: Dallas Mavericks eyeing ex $30 million San Antonio Spurs forward to bolster roster with Anthony Davis and Kyrie Irving Let us know if you feel that former All-Star Ben Simmons would have been a good fit for the Mavs. Do you think Simmons could have been a strong supporting player for Davis and Irving? Leave your opinions in the comments down below.
Article Summary: The dallas mavericks tried to sign ben simmons before he joined the los angeles clippers. Nba insider marc stein reported that dallas showed interest in simmons during the buyout market. The mavs are currently less than $200,000 away from the nba's first luxury-tax apron.

Article Title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are set to make their social debut, with the couple potentially walking a red carpet soon
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift might make their red carpet debut at the Met Gala

Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift, who have been dating since summer 2023, may be making their red carpet debut this year. They could have attended major red carpet events like Swift's Eras Tour film premiere in Los Angeles in October 2023 and the Grammys and VMAs in 2023 and 2024, but decided against them due to scheduling or unknown reasons. With Swift's Eras Tour over and Kelce having a break before the next football season, this event might be the perfect opportunity for them to make their red carpet debut.Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift have been busy with social engagements and busy schedules since dating in 2023. Taylor's Eras Tour and Travis' role in helping the Kansas City Chiefs win three consecutive Super Bowls make them as busy as any celebrity couple.Both Swift and Kelce, who are off the road after a disappointing Super Bowl loss, are expected to attend the Met Gala red carpet on May 5. People Magazine reports that they will make headlines due to their fashion expertise and previous attendance at the event. Both Swift and Kelce are expected to make a statement at the event.‚ÄúAs part of their R&R time, it's thought the couple could finally make an official red carpet appearance together ‚Äî with the Met Gala earmarked as their first potential event together,‚Äù the Mirror reported of Kelce and Swift. ‚ÄúSo far Swift and Kelce, who began dating in 2023, have struggled to align their schedules to step out together at an event.‚ÄùSwift and her boyfriend Kelce have decided to attend the Met Gala, a first for Swift, as she hasn't attended the event with any of her boyfriends since 2016. This follows their 2023 invitation to the Oscars, where they also declined. ‚Äú‚Ä¶ However the Met Gala isn't until May, and with Swift not planning to tour this year it's thought she and Kelce could turn out at the red carpet event together. The event would be a ‚Äòrelationship first' for the pair as they anticipated to step out together.‚ÄùAlso Read: ‚ÄúNegotiate with terrorists‚Äù: Saturday Night Live producer branded Travis Kelce's girlfriend Taylor Swift a terrorist Swift has been supporting Kansas City Chief Kelce after the Super Bowl 59 loss, but was unable to cheer on Kelce. Now, they plan to take time to enjoy each other. Swift is rumored to work on new music this year, possibly a new album, and is discussing a smaller-scale tour in 2026, similar to the Eras Tour.
Article Summary: Travis kelce and taylor swift may make their red carpet debut at the met gala. The couple have been dating since summer 2023. They could have attended major red carpet events like swift's eras tour film premiere in los angeles in october 2023, but decided against them due to scheduling or unknown reasons.

Article Title: Los Angeles Angels: Who is Cole Tucker‚Äôs wife Vanessa Hudgens? Everything on Angels star‚Äôs romance with Hollywood gem
Article Text:

Cole Tucker and Vanessa Hudgens' Shared Passion for Each Other's Careers



High School Musical

From Wedding Bells to Parenthood



"beyond magical."

Los Angeles Angels shortstop Cole Tucker is a household name in Major League Baseball, but outside of it, he's also well known for his celebrity relationship. His wife, Vanessa Hudgens , requires no introduction‚Äîshe is a Hollywood star and a childhood sweetheart to many, following her breakout inas. Throughout the years, Hudgens has established a strong career in movies such asand‚Äîbut more recently, it's her Cinderella romance with Tucker that has been holding everyone's attention.From a surprise virtual date to a fairy-tale wedding and the birth of their first child in July 2024, their romance has been an ideal mix of sports and celebrity.Unlike most celebrity-athlete romances, Tucker and Hudgens‚Äô story began in an unconventional way‚Äîa Zoom meditation group during the COVID-19 pandemic. Hudgens was instantly drawn to the charismatic shortstop and made the first move by sliding into his DMs after the session.By Valentine's Day 2021, the pair confirmed their relationship with an Instagram post with Caption, and they went on to make their red carpet appearance later that year at the premiere of. Hudgens publicly fawned over her relationship, referring to Tucker asand how lucky she felt to have met him.Raised and born in Phoenix, Arizona, Tucker was an outstanding high school player at Mountain Pointe High School before being selected 24th overall by the Pittsburgh Pirates in 2014. Tucker made his MLB debut in 2019, playing a few seasons for the Pirates before moving to the Colorado Rockies and eventually signing with the Los Angeles Angels.In June 2024, Tucker even pitched for the first time, a thrilling experience that Hudgens marked on Instagram with the post,Hudgens has been a regular presence at Tucker's games, cheering him on at various points in his career. She was first seen supporting him when he played for the Pittsburgh Pirates, and in August 2023, she was also seen in the stands at his Colorado Rockies debut, cheering him on as he got his first hit with the team.Tucker, however, had been a Vanessa Hudgens admirer way before they even met. In 2012, he even tweeted about needing a girl who would watchwith him. His love for the film series was so great that he let his signature curls grow long, inspired by Corbin Bleu's character who played baseball, Chad Danforth.Beyond baseball, Tucker is also passionate about music and golf, often sharing clips of his drum and guitar sessions on social media. In a fun moment, the couple even performed karaoke together, singing Jennifer Lopez and Ja Rule‚Äôs hit song, I‚Äôm Real.Tucker and Hudgens, who have been dating for three years, wed in Tulum, Mexico, on December 2, 2023. The wedding was a low-key, intimate ceremony at Azulik City of Arts, and Hudgens would later call itIn July 2024, the two welcomed their first child, though they have kept information like the name and sex of the baby confidential. Hudgens had taken fans by surprise at the 2024 Oscars when she made her baby bump public, which was a new turn in their love story.Cole Tucker might be making plays on the field, but off the diamond, he's winning in love. His love affair with Hollywood actress Vanessa Hudgens is a real fairytale, mixing baseball, Hollywood, and a solid base of love and support. As Tucker keeps on going with the Angels, Hudgens is his biggest cheerleader‚Äîshowing that their love story is one for the books.Also Read: PICS: Paul Skenes Enjoys Final Offseason Days with Olivia Dunne on Cozy Tropical Vacation to Siesta Key
Article Summary: Cole tucker and vanessa hudgens have been dating for three years. The couple married in tulum, mexico, on december 2, 2023. In july 2024, the two welcomed their first child, though they have kept the name and sex of the baby confidential. As tucker keeps on going with the angels, hudgens is his biggest cheerleader.

Article Title: F1 75 Live: Start time, streaming options & everything you need to know for the event
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

What is the F1 75 Live event?



When does F1 75 Live start?



How to watch F1 75 Live



The 2025 Formula 1 season will kick off with an electrifying spectacle in London, marking the sport‚Äôs 75th anniversary in style. F1 75 Live , set to take place at the iconic O2 arena, will bring together all 10 teams, 20 drivers, and team bosses for a one-of-a-kind showcase. For the first time ever, fans will witness all 10 team liveries revealed in real-time during this live televised event. But that‚Äôs just the beginning. The spotlight will shine on Lewis Hamilton as he makes his highly anticipated first public appearance for Ferrari, while rookie debuts and eight revamped driver lineups add to the excitement. With the 2025 season set to redefine F1‚Äôs legacy, this event promises to be a historic moment for motorsport enthusiasts worldwide. Here's everything you need to know about the event.The F1 75 Live event at The O2 will feature all 10 teams and 20 drivers, showcasing new liveries and race suits for eager fans. With special guests and live interviews with ‚Äúkey figures from the sport,‚Äù the event promises to deliver an unforgettable experience. This marks the first major F1 event in London since 2017, when ‚ÄòF1 Live London‚Äô celebrated Liberty Media‚Äôs arrival. While teams like Williams and Haas have already unveiled their designs, Ferrari, Aston Martin, and Mercedes will reveal theirs in exclusive showcases starting Wednesday.The O2 in London will host Formula One's 75th anniversary kickoff event on February 18. More than 15,000 fans will be present, and tickets sold out in less than 20 minutes. The show will begin at 8 p.m. GMT (3 p.m. ET) and run for two hours.Also Read: How a Netflix show 'Drive to Survive' transformed F1‚Äôs global popularity Missed out on the exclusive 15,000 tickets for F1 75 Live? No worries! The event will be streamed for free on F1‚Äôs YouTube channel and social media platforms. Fans in the U.S. can catch it on ESPN, while Sky Sports will broadcast it in the UK. ‚ÄúFormula 1 broadcasters from around the globe‚Äù will also air it live, so check your local listings for availability.
Article Summary: The o2 in london will host formula one's 75th anniversary kickoff event on february 18. F1 75 live will feature all 10 teams and 20 drivers, showcasing new liveries and race suits for eager fans. More than 15,000 fans will be present, and tickets sold out in less than 20 minutes.

Article Title: Vince Wilfork Reveals The Unseen Side of Tom Brady Which He Saw at the Kentucky Derby
Article Text:
Vince Wilfork had the nicest words for Tom Brady. Source: Getty

The ‚ÄòYoung and Drunk‚Äô Version Of Tom Brady Which Vince Wilfork Saw At The Derby

For most NFL fans, Tom Brady ‚Äôs let-his-hair-down moment and the ensuing drunken trophy toss at the Buccaneers‚Äô Super Bowl parade was a rare glimpse of him letting loose. But his teammates have often talked about how Brady loves partying. Former Patriots DT Vince Wilfork has recently revealed that Brady‚Äôs 2021 trophy toss wasn‚Äôt the only time the team got a look at Brady‚Äôs fun side.In the latest episode of Green Light with Chris Long, Wilfork revealed that he saw an adventurous side of Tom Brady at the 2014 Kentucky Derby . Wilfork said that during his and Brady‚Äôs attendance at the Derby, the latter got quite drunk and lost some of his inhibition.‚ÄúYes, I did see him drunk, but it was early on in my career. Tom was always private, like Tom only used to hang around certain people and stuff, but I think I‚Äôve seen him drunk because we had gone to Derby. There I got a chance to see the different side of him,‚Äù Wilfork recalled.Tom Brady is a big Kentucky Derby fan and visited Churchill Downs where his Pork Pie hat would make headlines the next day. Wilfork also pointed out how Brady was different than most quarterbacks especially when it comes to dealing with people.Also Read: THROWBACK: When the FBI Helped Find $500K Worth Super Bowl Jersey of NFL Legend Tom Brady ‚ÄúTom never acted like one of those bougie quarterbacks. He is a great team player,‚Äù Wilfork broke down. ‚ÄúI would see rookies coming in and they would have a jersey and Tom would sit there and sign. He would tell nobody no, he never cared who you are, he doesn‚Äôt care how long you‚Äôve been in the league‚Äîhe would sit and sign for you.‚ÄùWilfork also called the seven-time Super Bowl winner one of the best teammates he‚Äôs ever had the chance to play with. Many kudos go to him because you know QBs have a stigmatism to where they are known to be a-holes. But Tom probably is one of the greatest teammates I‚Äôve had.‚Äù
Article Summary: Vince wilfork revealed that he saw tom brady drunk at the kentucky derby. The former new england patriots dt also called brady one of the best teammates he's ever had the chance to play with. ‚Äútom never acted like one of those bougie quarterbacks. He is a great team player,‚Äù wilfork said.

Article Title: ‚ÄúMy little girl would love to meet you!‚Äù - Cody Rhodes Receives Special Request from Fan Ahead of WWE RAW Appearance
Article Text:
(Image Via Kameona Hokoana's "X" Account)

WWE Fan Makes Special Request to Cody Rhodes



Tonight, " American Nightmare " Cody Rhodes will be a man that Charlotte WWE fans will be waiting to see during the WWE show. As part of this excited crowd will be a young girl, sitting in the front row, with a very special poster, hoping to get the autograph from Cody Rhodes on it. Social media caught that endearing moment and the entire WWE fanbase is now watching to see whether or not this wish comes true.The little girl's father posted something on social media for all to see his daughter's excitement about the WWE show in Charlotte. The poster indicated that she is in the hope of being front row and getting that coveted autograph from none other than Cody Rhodes. A little girl is waiting to meet her favorite wrestler player. Cody Rhodes, for years and years known among loyal fans, has shown that he is willing to connect with the audience every day with the tender gestures he makes on behalf of the needy. Because of this growing relationship with the crowd, he has truly made his way into the hearts of the audience and their passion for the show, which is why he is probably one of the most popular WWE superstars. Rhodes skillfully creates unforgettable moments with his astonishing ring work and his connection with fans, inside and outside the ring.Charlotte in another electrifying WWE event, the fans will now wait and see their superstars as they perform. This might be one of the greatest nights the young girl and her entire family will ever experience if Cody Rhodes takes notice of her letter.Also read: Top 5 Cody Rhodes WWE Moments of 2024 Such moments draw forth what professional wrestling is more than just entertainment's community and connection. The ability of Cody Rhodes to make meaningful interactions with his fans, especially the younger packed generation cohort, even more so, is a beautiful symbol of the difference that wonderful athletes can make outside the ring. Wherever this event is, arena or in-home viewing, fans shall always hold this night as a memory in their hearts filled with feel-good moments that truly set WWE special.
Article Summary: Wwe fan makes special request to cody rhodes for an autograph. Social media caught that endearing moment and the entire wwe fanbase is now watching to see whether or not this wish comes true. The ability of cody rhodes to make meaningful interactions with his fans, especially the younger generation cohort, is a beautiful symbol of the difference that wonderful athletes can make outside the ring.

Article Title: Joe Burrow's new video goes viral as it raises eyebrows and leaves fans losing their minds over his latest move
Article Text:
Image via Cooper Neill/Getty

Joe Burrow‚Äôs New Video Uploaded By The Cincinnati Bengals Has Fans Losing Their Minds Over His Looks



Joe Burrow‚Äôs Personal Life Has Been A Victim Of Speculations And Rumours



Joe Burrow, the quarterback of the Cincinnati Bengals , has been in the news for his appearance in the NFL Pro Bowl Games . Many fans could not get over how handsome he looked as he played for his team, the Cincinnati Bengals. But now it seems like, fans have found another video of Joe Burrow and the reactions are hilarious.A couple of days ago, the Cincinnati Bengals, uploaded a hilarious video of Joe Burrow from the NFL Pro Bowl Games on their official YouTube account. The video is titled as, ‚Äú10 HOURS of Joe Burrow SITTING that you can study, heal and relax to | deep focus Joe-lofi‚Äù, and fans are here for it.A fan account of Joe Burrow took to X to post a screenshot of the video uploaded by Cincinnati Bengals with a caption that read as,‚Äù ‚Äúwhat are you watching?‚Äù oh nothing! just 10 hours of joe burrow sitting down‚Äù and fans are losing their minds over it.A fan commented, ‚ÄúThey should make a 24 hour one‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚Äúthis would go crazy!!!!!! @Bengals yk what to do‚ÄùFans on YouTube too are equally impressed about this hilarious video of Joe Burrow‚Äôs that has been uploaded by the Cincinnati Bengals. A fan wrote, ‚Äúall these years, it took, for the perfect youtube video to be created‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚ÄúI never knew I needed this but yeah, I did‚Äù.Joe Burrow‚Äôs looks have been a huge topic of discussion among fans on X. Many fans could not stop raving about how handsome and good looking the star player looked as he participated in the NFL Pro Bowl Games.A few months ago when speculations were on the rise if Joe Burrow was in a relationship with famous model Olivia Ponton, many fans expressed jealousy over it and even trolled her. But neither Joe Burrow nor Olivia Ponton has opened up yet to discuss about their connection.These rumours began in December 2024 when Joe Burrow‚Äôs house was broken into and it was, as per TMZ Sports, Olivia Ponton who filed a report against it.As per People, Joe Burrow and Olivia Ponton are only ‚Äúhooking up‚Äù and there is nothing serious between them. But this too has not been confirmed by the couple yet.Joe Burrow was last spotted attending the NFL Honors 2025 where he was also spotted posing for a picture with an elderly woman and fans were "jealous" about it on X. Many fans hilariously wished they were in the elderly woman's place and posing with Joe Burrow.Also Read: Taylor Swift decides to keep "low" profile as Blake Lively returns to the spotlight amid ongoing Justin Baldoni drama and Super Bowl trolling
Article Summary: Joe burrow‚Äôs looks have been a huge topic of discussion among fans on x. Many fans could not stop raving about how handsome and good looking the star player looked as he participated in the nfl pro bowl games. A few months ago when speculations were on the rise if joe burrow was in a relationship with famous model olivia ponton, many fans expressed jealousy over it.

Article Title: Champions Trophy 2025: Fixtures, format, groups, live streaming, prize money - all you need to know
Article Text:
ICC Champions Trophy 2025 (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

How have the teams qualified

India begin Champions Trophy prep | Rishabh Pant struck on knee

Champions Trophy prep: Team India begins training at ICC Academy ahead of Bangladesh clash | EXCLUSIVE VISUALS

Mission Champions Trophy gets underway as Team India lands in Dubai

Champions Trophy 2025 Fixtures

Date Teams Venue Time (IST) February 19 Pakistan vs New Zealand, Group A National Stadium, Karachi 2:30 PM February 20 India vs Bangladesh, Group A Dubai International Cricket Stadium 2:30 PM February 21 Afghanistan vs South Africa, Group B National Stadium, Karachi 2:30 PM February 22 Australia vs England, Group B Gaddafi Stadium, Lahore 2:30 PM February 23 India vs Pakistan, Group A Dubai International Cricket Stadium 2:30 PM February 24 Bangladesh vs New Zealand, Group A Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium 2:30 PM February 25 Australia vs South Africa, Group B Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium 2:30 PM February 26 Afghanistan vs England, Group B Gaddafi Stadium, Lahore 2:30 PM February 27 Pakistan vs Bangladesh, Group A Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium 2:30 PM February 28 Afghanistan vs Australia, Group B Gaddafi Stadium, Lahore 2:30 PM March 1 South Africa vs England, Group B National Stadium, Karachi 2:30 PM March 2 India vs New Zealand, Group A Dubai International Cricket Stadium 2:30 PM March 4 TBC vs TBC, 1st Semi-final Dubai International Cricket Stadium 2:30 PM March 5 TBC vs TBC, 2nd Semi-final Gaddafi Stadium, Lahore 2:30 PM March 9 TBC vs TBC, Final Lahore/Dubai 2:30 PM

India: JioStar (Live streaming on Jio Hotstar, Television coverage on Star and Network 18 channels)

The ICC Champions Trophy is returning for its ninth edition, featuring eight top ODI teams. Pakistan, the defending champions who won their first title in 2017, will host the tournament. India will play all their matches in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.The tournament begins on February 19 with hosts Pakistan facing New Zealand in Karachi. The final will take place on March 9 but the venue is unclear. If India go all the way, the final will take place in Dubai. If not, it will take place the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore.The qualification process for the 2025 edition was determined by the 2023 ODI World Cup standings. The top eight teams from the 10-team points table, including host Pakistan, qualified for the Champions Trophy. The biggest absentee in Pakistan and Dubai are the 2004 champions West Indies.The teams are divided into two groups. Group A consists of Pakistan, India, Bangladesh, and New Zealand. Group B includes Australia, Afghanistan, England, and South Africa.Afghanistan are making their Champions Trophy debut after their impressive performance in the ODI World Cup, where they defeated England, Pakistan, and Sri Lanka. They recently achieved their first semi-finals appearance in an ICC tournament during the T20 World Cup last year.The tournament format remains unchanged since 2006. Eight teams are divided into two groups, with each team playing against others in their group once. The top two teams from each group advance to the semi-finals.The prize money has increased significantly for this edition when compared to last. The winners will receive $2.24 million, runners-up $1.12 million, and losing semi-finalists $560,000 each. The total prize pool is $6.9 million, marking a 53 percent increase from 2017.The tournament begins in Karachi on February 19. India start their campaign against Bangladesh in Dubai on February 20, followed by the blockbuster against Pakistan (February 23). The same weekend will feature World Cup champions Australia against England.The semi-finals are scheduled for March 4 and 5 in Dubai and Lahore. The final will take place on March 9 at Lahore's Gaddafi Stadium. However, if India qualify, the final will be played in Dubai.The Champions Trophy will be broadcast on JioStar in India. It will be available on Star and Network18 channels on linear TV and on Jio Hotstar on OTT.Pakistan: PTV and Ten Sports, Streaming options: Myco and Tamasha appUAE and MENA: CricLife Max and CricLife Max2, Streaming option: STARZPLAYUK: Live broadcasting on Sky Sports Cricket, Sky Sports Main Event, Sky Sports Action, Digital coverage via SkyGO, NOW and Sky Sports AppUSA and Canada: WillowTV, Streaming on Willow by Cricbuzz app (Hindi coverage available)Caribbean: ESPNCaribbean on TV, Streaming via ESPN Play Caribbean appAustralia: PrimeVideo (coverage available in Hindi too)New Zealand: Sky Sport NZ, digital coverage via Now and SkyGo app.South Africa and sub-Saharan territories: SuperSport and SuperSport AppBangladesh: Nagorik TV and T Sports for linear broadcast, digital via Toffee appAfghanistan: ATNSri Lanka: Maharaja TV (TV1 on Linear), Digital via Sirasa
Article Summary: The icc champions trophy is returning for its ninth edition, featuring eight top odi teams. Pakistan, the defending champions who won their first title in 2017, will host the tournament. India start their campaign against bangladesh in dubai on february 20, followed by the blockbuster against pakistan (february 23) the same weekend will feature world cup champions australia against england.

NEW DELHI: The Board of Control for Cricket in India on Sunday unveiled a 74-match schedule for the 18th Indian Premier League that will be held across 13 venues, starting on March 22 with the blockbuster clash between defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders and Royal Challengers Bengaluru at Eden Gardens.This year, the iconic Eden Gardens will also host the final on May 25.The schedule, featuring 12 double-headers will see games being held over 65 days across 13 venues, with Dharamsala, Guwahati, and Visakhapatnam hosting a couple of IPL fixtures each.Dharamsala will serve as Punjab Kings' second home venue alongside Mullanpur (New Chandigarh), while Rajasthan Royals will make Guwahati their base in addition to Jaipur.Delhi Capitals will have Visakhapatnam as their second home venue and will start their league campaign there on March 24 against Lucknow Super Giants.The playoffs will be staged in Hyderabad and Kolkata after the league stage.Hyderabad will host Qualifier 1 and the Eliminator on May 20 and May 21, respectively, with the action shifting to Kolkata for Qualifier 2 on May 23.The IPL will continue with its two-group structure after the 2022 expansion to a 10-team format.Kolkata Knight Riders, Royal Challengers Bangalore, Rajasthan Royals, Chennai Super Kings, and Punjab Kings are in one group, while Sunrisers Hyderabad, Delhi Capitals, Gujarat Titans, Mumbai Indians, and Lucknow Super Giants are in the other.

Article Title: ‚ÄúWhat's the point of watching‚Äù: Washington Capitals superstar Alex Ovechkin bashed the NHL for the absence of Russian players in 4 Nations Face-Off
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Alex Ovechkin disses NHL for the absence of Russian players in 4 Nations Face-Off

Alex Ovechkin , a Washington Capitals star, provided some insightful remarks to Gary Bettman and the NHL regarding the Four Nations faceoff, which has been a success, featuring dramatic moments like the match between Toronto Maple Leafs Mitch Marner and William Nylander. The event has been the first best-on-best tournament in a long time.Alex Ovechkin is not participating in the 4 Nations Face-Off tournament, leaving Russians' status for the upcoming Olympics in doubt. Russia could have formed a dynamic roster with players like Ovechkin, Kucherov, Malkin, Kaprizov, and Panarin, and goalkeepers Shesterkin or Vasilevsky. Evgeni Malkin expressed interest in the 4 Nations Face-Off, which was relayed to Ovechkin, who was asked about his attention to the tournament by Match TV.Alex Ovechkin referenced this in his latest comments about the tournament, indicating that he simply does not care because his countrymen are not there. "I won't be watching the Four Nations Tournament. What's the point of watching something where the Russian team isn't participating?‚ÄùOvechkin, who would likely lead the Russian team in scoring, would not be watching the Four Nations faceoff on TV. Instead, he has taken advantage of his vacation in Miami, where he is currently on vacation. Despite this, he is still taking care of himself, posting about training with one of his former teammates.Alex Ovechkin is close to surpassing Wayne Gretzky with 879 career goals, just 15 behind the NHL's all-time leading goal scorer. Ovechkin's rapid scoring pace this season has helped close the gap. To surpass Gretzky, Ovechkin needs 16 goals in 27 games and a 0.593 goals-per-game pace, with a goal-per-game rate of 0.593.Also Read: Charlie McAvoy threw a textbook hit to Connor McDavid, sending the world's best hockey player down to the ice Hopefully, the next time we get a major best-on-best tournament where Russians and other Europeans can participate, while focusing on the NHL's success thus far, as it has not disappointed them thus far.
Article Summary: Alex ovechkin is not participating in the 4 nations face-off tournament, leaving russians' status for the upcoming olympics in doubt. The event has been the first best-on-best tournament in a long time. "i won't be watching the four nations tournament. What's the point of watching something where the russian team isn't participating?‚Äù

Article Title: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs been my dream": FIA President pushes for 12th F1 team from China following Cadillac‚Äôs entry into the Sport
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Chinese F1 Team Next? FIA President Eyes Expansion After Cadillac Joins the Grid



The landscape of Formula 1 is undergoing a significant transformation, with FIA President Mohammed Ben Sulayem now advocating for the inclusion of a twelfth team, ideally from China. His remarks come shortly after General Motors' Cadillac secured a spot on the 2026 grid as the sport‚Äôs eleventh team, marking a pivotal moment in F1‚Äôs expansion.The journey to Cadillac‚Äôs entry into Formula 1 was anything but smooth. Despite initially passing FIA's stringent evaluation under the Andretti Cadillac name, the bid was rejected by Formula One Management (FOM) on commercial grounds. Many team principals opposed the expansion beyond ten teams, citing concerns over revenue distribution and logistical complications. However, a strategic shift‚Äîwhere General Motors took a more direct role‚Äîhelped Cadillac finally gain acceptance.This move positioned Cadillac as the second American team in Formula 1, joining Haas. The decision also reinforced Ben Sulayem‚Äôs long-term vision of attracting major manufacturers from influential automotive markets, further diversifying the sport.Following Cadillac‚Äôs approval, Ben Sulayem has now turned his focus toward securing a Chinese manufacturer for Formula 1. China already boasts its first F1 driver, Zhou Guanyu, and bringing a national manufacturer into the mix would elevate the country‚Äôs presence in the sport. Speaking to Le Figaro, the FIA president emphasized his belief that expanding the grid with new teams rather than increasing the number of races would be beneficial."20 races was enough, and from the outset, I've thought that we need fewer grands prix, but more teams. That's why we brought in General Motors with Cadillac," Ben Sulayem stated.While acknowledging skepticism from within the sport, he maintained that expansion strengthens Formula 1‚Äôs global appeal. "A lot of people were against it, but I think it's a good decision for the sport."When asked about adding a twelfth team, he reaffirmed his desire for a quality entrant rather than simply increasing numbers. "Should we think in terms of quantity or quality? We need quality stables," he said."It's been my dream for the last two years that the big countries should have a presence in Formula 1."The United States will be with General Motors. The next step is to welcome a Chinese manufacturer. We already have a driver [in Ferrari reserve and ex-Stake driver, Zhou Guanyu]."With Cadillac confirmed for 2026, the next few years could see increased discussions around expanding the grid further. However, any new team would face regulatory and commercial hurdles similar to those Cadillac encountered. If a Chinese manufacturer does join, it would mark a historic step in Formula 1‚Äôs globalization strategy.Also Read: "Anyone who doubts him is silly": Lando Norris slams critics of Lewis Hamilton ahead of Ferrari F1 debut For now, all eyes remain on how Cadillac integrates into the sport and whether Ben Sulayem‚Äôs vision of a more inclusive, manufacturer-driven F1 grid will come to fruition.
Article Summary: Fia president mohammed ben sulayem calls for a twelfth team, ideally from china. His remarks come shortly after general motors' cadillac secured a spot on the 2026 grid as the sport‚Äôs eleventh team. The fia president emphasized that expanding the grid with new teams rather than increasing the number of races would be beneficial.

Article Title: Liam Lawson braces for "Very, Very Tough" start in Red Bull F1 due to track challenges
Article Text:
Credit: Coates / XPB Images

Liam Lawson Expects a Challenging Red Bull F1 Debut



Liam Lawson on the 2025 F1 Season, Advice For Rookies, & George Russell's Escape Room Skills

Liam Lawson is set to make his highly anticipated full-season debut in Formula 1, stepping into a Red Bull seat alongside Max Verstappen . However, the young Kiwi is under no illusions about the challenges ahead. With only 11 grand prix starts under his belt, all of which came in the latter half of 2023 and 2024, Lawson acknowledges that adapting to the demands of a full F1 calendar will be a daunting task.Liam Lawson was officially named as Sergio Perez‚Äôs replacement in December, following a disappointing season for the Mexican driver. Despite Red Bull‚Äôs dominant performance last year, the 22-year-old driver is not expecting immediate success, particularly given his lack of experience on several circuits that feature early in the 2025 calendar.The upcoming season will introduce Lawson to a host of unfamiliar tracks, adding an extra layer of difficulty to his transition into one of F1‚Äôs most competitive seats. ‚ÄúGoing into a year like this, especially the start of the season, I‚Äôm going to a lot of tracks I haven‚Äôt done before,‚Äù he admitted. ‚ÄúI think the start of the year is going to be the hardest as well. Going to a bunch of tracks I haven‚Äôt done before starting the season, it‚Äôs going to be very, very tough.‚ÄùWhile the Red Bull RB21 is expected to be a front-running car, Lawson is not setting unrealistic expectations for himself. His early-season schedule includes challenging circuits like Melbourne, Shanghai, Miami, and Montreal‚Äîplaces he has either never raced on or only experienced in junior categories. Nonetheless, he remains eager to embrace the challenge, stating, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm very excited for Melbourne and I‚Äôm very excited for the start of the year.‚ÄùDespite the uphill battle, Lawson is looking forward to proving himself at the highest level. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a lot of cool tracks that I haven‚Äôt done that I think I will enjoy, like Melbourne. China looks like a cool track, Canada is somewhere I‚Äôve always wanted to drive.‚ÄùAlso Read: "Anyone who doubts him is silly": Lando Norris slams critics of Lewis Hamilton ahead of Ferrari F1 debut With a new team, heightened expectations, and an uncharted season ahead, Lawson is prepared for what could be his toughest yet most rewarding year in Formula 1.
Article Summary: Liam lawson is set to make his full-season debut for red bull in 2025. The 22-year-old kiwi has only made 11 grand prix starts in his career. He admits that adapting to the demands of a full f1 calendar will be difficult.

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings (PBKS) will kick off their IPL 2025 campaign against Gujarat Titans (GT) in Ahmedabad on March 25. The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has unveiled the full schedule for the season, which begins with defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) facing Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) at Eden Gardens on March 22.This edition of the tournament will feature 74 matches across 13 venues, including 12 double-headers. Afternoon games will start at 3:30 PM IST, while evening matches will commence at 7:30 PM IST.The tournament will conclude at Eden Gardens in Kolkata, where Qualifier 2 and the final will be held.Punjab Kings are still in pursuit of their maiden IPL title, having never won since the league's inception in 2008. Shreyas Iyer, who led KKR to their third IPL title in 2024, will captain PBKS this season, aiming to change the franchise's fortunes.
Article Summary: Punjab kings will kick off their ipl 2025 campaign against gujarat titans (gt) on march 25. The board of control for cricket in india (bcci) has unveiled the full schedule for the season, which begins with defending champions kolkata knight riders (kkr) at eden gardens on march 22.
